mapper.select: select * from community order by co_num
mapper.insert: insert into post(po_co_num, po_me_id, po_title, po_content) values(#{post.po_co_num },#{post.po_me_id },#{post.po_title },#{post.po_content })
mapper.select: SELECT post.*, count(if(re_state=1, re_state, null)) po_up, count(if(re_state=-1, re_state, null)) po_down FROM post LEFT JOIN recommend ON po_num = re_po_num where po_num = #{po_num} GROUP BY po_num;
mapper.update: update post set po_view = po_view + 1 where po_num = #{po_num}
